sentences.en: Are there any rules that stipulate the order of relay?
sentences.cn: 接力游泳有什么顺序规定 呢 ?

sentences.en: Can you stipulate they would carry out the treaty?
sentences.cn: 你能保证他们会执行该条约 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does GM China stipulate a standard service charge in China?
sentences.cn: 通用汽车在中国是否有统一的维修收费标准?

sentences.en: Each time we stipulate what temperature we have in mind.
sentences.cn: 我们每次约定谈什么样的温度便可.

sentences.en: I stipulate that the tenant is responsible for all repairs.
sentences.cn: 我订明承租人负责一切的修缮(工程).

sentences.en: I stipulate this only nothing further.
sentences.cn: 我要的条件只这一点,别的不要.

sentences.en: International rules stipulate the number of foreign entrants.
sentences.cn: 国际规则规定了外国参赛者的人数。

sentences.en: Laws stipulate the maximum interest rate that banks can charge.
sentences.cn: 法律对银行可以收取的最高利率作了规定。

sentences.en: Some manufacturers stipulate the price at which their goods are to be sold.
sentences.cn: 有些制造商规定出售他们生产的商品的价格.

sentences.en: Stipulate responsibilities, authorities, protocols and problem - solving steps, as appropriate.
sentences.cn: 规定职责 、 权限 、 适当的草案和解决问题的步骤.

sentences.en: Stipulate Standard Operation Procedure and Total Productive Maintenance for shop floor operation.
sentences.cn: 为生产车间制订标准作业程序和全员性设备维护.

sentences.en: The selling clause that the agent should stipulate manufacturers explains users.
sentences.cn: 代理人应把制造商规定的销售条款对用户解释.

sentences.en: This company stipulate that all of its employees work eight - hour days.
sentences.cn: 公司明文规定员工一天上班八小时.

sentences.en: We shall make shipment within the time the contract stipulate.
sentences.cn: 我们将在合同规定的期限内装船.

sentences.en: We stipulate that our salesgirl must be polite to customer.
sentences.cn: 我们规定售货小姐们必须礼貌待客.

sentences.en: We stipulate that our salesgirls must be polite to customers.
sentences.cn: 我们规定我们的售货小姐必须礼貌待客.

trans.tran_en: if an agreement, law, or rule stipulates something, it must be done

trans.tran_cn: （尤指在协议或建议中）规定，约定，讲明（条件等）
